results.title: Novel action of metformin in the prevention of haloperidol-induced catalepsy in mice: Potential in the treatment of Parkinson's disease?
results.text_hl: Importantly, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly reduced the duration of @<m>DISEASE_Catalepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002375 @@@catalepsy@@@ score during acute and chronic @<m>DISEASE_Catalepsy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002375 @@@catalepsy@@@ tests as compared to trihexylphenidyl (reference standard).

citations.NLM: Adedeji HA, Ishola IO, Adeyemi OO. Novel action of metformin in the prevention of haloperidol-induced catalepsy in mice: Potential in the treatment of Parkinson's disease? Prog Neuropsychopharmacol Biol Psychiatry. 2014 Jan 3;48():245-251. PMID: 24513020
